body:
Hello everyone. I would like to announce that I will be going on a vacation to Virginia, USA. I would be there at my cousins house for a few days and at a hotel in Virginia Beach with oceanfront view :3. It will be a 17 hour drive so be booked a hotel in the middle of the route to virginia. We will start driving Friday morning. I will be back home next Thursday.
Bye guys! :D

title: Vacation!
